title: Improvised Hacker

fields.name: Hacking Skill:
fields.value:
Very Low

# THIS ROLE CANNOT SPAWN NATURALLY
It can only spawn by another NETSEC Operative choosing to becoming this role with the associated text.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may attempt to hack a node. The chance of success is increased depending on how many people attempt to hack the node.
- You may look for data on a hacked node. this will reveal a random TI result about a random player in the game.
- Once per game, you may transport yourself to a safe location, this will negate any negative visits that may occur to them that night.
- You may check the dumpsters and trash bins for important information. This will decrease the difficulty of a random node when successful
